title: mm怪物使用技能时报错，麻烦看看谢谢
author: cvcocvc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cvcocvc 于 2019-2-9 18:58 编辑 

下面是报错，有两处一处是怪物飞起来时

replies.author: 弱鸡绿毛怪
replies.txt_content: Cannot make FireworkEffect without any color 大概是不是烟花粒子效果写错了，没填颜色?还是版本的问题？

replies.author: cvcocvc
replies.txt_content:
MagicLocyDragon 发表于 2019-2-9 19:00
Cannot make FireworkEffect without any color 大概是不是烟花粒子效果写错了，没填颜色?还是版本的问题？ ...
TNT爆炸的时候没有报错，就是炸毁方块后自动恢复的时候就会报错 [MythicMobsExtension] Task #110634 for MythicMobsExtension v1.239 generated an exception java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 18, Size: 18         at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]         at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]         at com.gmail.berndivader.mythicmobsext.utils.UndoBlockListener$1.run(UndoBlockListener.java:95) ~[?:?]         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1647.jar:git-Spigot-642f6d2-57ab4cf]         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:361) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1647.jar:git-Spigot-642f6d2-57ab4cf]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:739) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1647.jar:git-Spigot-642f6d2-57ab4cf]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:406) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1647.jar:git-Spigot-642f6d2-57ab4cf]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:679) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1647.jar:git-Spigot-642f6d2-57ab4cf]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:577) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1647.jar:git-Spigot-642f6d2-57ab4cf]         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_45]
